metadata.title: Non-Public Approved Training Providers | SkilledTradesBC

markdown:
Skip to main content

###### Menu

____ Show/hide collapsed content

The following non-public training providers are designated by SkilledTradesBC to deliver trade programs that lead to credits toward SkilledTradesBC credentials. 

For each trade delivered by designated non-public training providers, the list below will outline:

  * The designated training providers offering each trade

  * The trade levels and locations that have been designated

  * The designation starting and expiry dates for each level and location 




How to read the tables below:

Training Provider | Level | Location | Start Date | Expiry Date  
---|---|---|---|---  
Name of the approved school | What level they are approved for | Location in BC | When they were **_first_** __ approved | When their current application expires  
  
Non-public programs
